comments.body:
Add the distro version check at the start of this file and use `meta: end_play` to stop the tests if the requirements aren't met. Something like:

```yaml
- name: Skip unsupported platforms
  meta: end_play
  when: CONDITION HERE
```
added in my check list :) thanks

comments.body: Also add a handler to this role that kills the service and trigger it here. That way the service will always be killed regardless of whether the test passes or fails. The handler should also uninstall packages that were installed during the test.
I added 1. stop service 2. remove remote_tmp_dir 3. remove all service file

Those tasks were added in the `always` section of a block in a separate role (`wildfly`). It would be better to have them as a handler here so that the role that installs wildfly is also responsible for the cleanup. That way future roles that use this role as a dependency won't have to remember to add cleanup tasks.
